Name: zul-iqembulezifundi
Author: Iqembu Lezifundiswa, Mussa Muhammad Telela , Uthman Mfanafuthi Msomi, Moulana Abdur Rahman Chilipa, Haji Ibrahim Mondli Japhet Mthembu, Moulana Imran Ngcobo, Moulana Eshaaq Osman
Source: Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa(IDM), https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Asizange yini sikunwebele (sikuvulele) isifuba sakho na
Ngakho-ke uma usuqedile (umsebenzi wakho) sukuma (uphinde uthandaze)
Ngempela samdala umuntu ngokubunjwa (ngesimo) esihle kakhulu
Ngaphandle kwalabo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo, manjalo okwabo ngumvuzo ongapheliyo
Ngokho-ke yini lena ekwenza uphike usuku lokwahlulela
Akusiyena yini uMvelinqangi umehluleli wabehluleli na
Funda, futhi iNkosi yakho inobubele kakhulu
Ngakube ubonile yini uma ephika futhi efulathela (iqiniso)
Lutho! Uma engaphezi, ngempela siyomdonsa ngesihlonti
Lutho! Ungamhloniphi kodwa guqa phansi futhi usondele (kuMvelinqangi)
Futhi yini ekwenza wazi ukuthi yini ubusuku obunqunyiwe
Izingelosi kanye nomoya (uGabriyeli) zehlika ngabo (ubusuku obunamandla) ngemvume yeNKosi yazo nalolonke udaba
Ukuthula yikona! Kuze kube ukuphakama kokusa
Labo abangazange bakholwe abaphuma phakathi kwabantu bencwadi kanye nabakhonza izithombe abazange bayeke (ukukhonza izithombe) kwaze kwaba yilapho befikelwa ubufakazi obucacile
Isithunywa esivela kuMvelinqangi sifunda imibhalo emsulwa
Futhi abazange baqembukelane labo ababenikezwe incwadi kwaze kwaba yingemumva kokuthi sekufike kubona ubufakazi obucacile

Futhi abazange baphoqwe ngaphandle kokuthi bakhonze uMvelinqangi babeqotho kuyena ngenkolo, babeneqiniso futhi benze umthandazo futhi banikele ngezakaah (ingxenye yengcebo ekhokhwa kwabampofu) futhi leyo yinkolo yeqiniso
Ngempela labo abangazange bakholwe abaphuma phakathi kwabantu bencwadi nabakhonza izithixo bayokuba semlilweni wesihogo bayohlala phakathi kuwona ingunaphakade, labo- ke bona bayizidalwa ezimbi
Ngempela labo abakholwayo futhi abenza izenzo ezilungileyo labo-ke bona bayizidalwa ezinhle

Umvuzo wabo useNkosini yabo kuyoba yizivande zangunaphakade okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula, bayohlala lapho phakathi ingunaphakade uMvelinqangi uyothokoza ngabo futhi bayothokoza ngaye, lokho okwanoma ngabe ngubani owesaba iNKosi yakhe
Khumbula	ngenkathi	uma	umhlaba	uyozama-zama ngokunyakaza kwawo
Futhi khumbula ngenkathi umhlaba ukhipha imithwalo yawo
Ngalolosuku	abantu	bayoza	bengamaqembu	ukuze bakhonjiswe izenzo zabo
Ngakho-ke noma ngabe ngubani owenza okungangesisindo esincane sokuhle uyokubona
Futhi noma ngabe ngubani owenza okungangesisindo esincane sokubi uyokubona
Futhi ngempela yena usothandweni kakhulu lengcebo
